1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Qais bint Mihsan said:"I came to the Messenger of Allah with a son of mine who was not yet eating solid food, and he (the baby) urinated on him. He called for water and sprinkled it over (the urine)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بَوْلِ الصَّبِيِّ الَّذِي لَمْ يَطْعَمْ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the urine of an infant boy who is not yet eating solid food
